Created attachment 32168
Add support for ErrorDocument with some error codes

If I specify, e.g.:

ErrorDocument 414 /error.html

and request some absurdly long URI, I get the canned error response page. I couldn't find any reason in the code why we can't support ErrorDocument for some of these error codes.

The patch attached has some smell to it, but it's the easiest way to get it working for the 414 code. Anything more reasonable seems like it would need a refactor of read_request_line().
